MAPPING.DESCRIPTION: This mapping loads the data from Pre Staging to Staging for Contract Gift. It will implement SCD2 and error handling.
MAPPING.NAME: m_PS_TO_STG_S_TXN_CONTRACT_GIFT_LOAD

TRANSFORMATION.DESCRIPTION: This expression is used to generate the ETL Common Column values to insert records and set CURRENT_FLAG to Y
TRANSFORMATION.NAME: EXP_INSERT_S_TXN_CONTRACT_GIFT_RELEASE

TRANSFORMATION.DESCRIPTION: This expression transformation is used as a pass through expression and to genereate the Error columns for the Error Table along with the Error_flag
TRANSFORMATION.NAME: EXP_GENERATE_COMMON_FIELDS

TRANSFORMFIELD.EXPRESSION: IIF(ISNULL(ITEM_SEQUENCE_NUMBER),$$E009) || IIF( ISNULL(DPI_CONTRACT_KEY), '~'||$$R001) || IIF(ISNULL(PRD_CATLG_KEY), '~'||$$R002) || IIF(ISNULL(FEATURE_TRANSACTION_ID), '~'||$$E010) || IIF(ISNULL(INFINIUM_GL_CODE), '~'||$$E015,IIF(INFINIUM_GL_CODE='0000000000000000000000','~'||$$D002))
TRANSFORMFIELD.NAME: v_ERROR_CODE

TRANSFORMFIELD.EXPRESSION: IIF(ISNULL(DPI_CONTRACT_KEY)OR ISNULL(PRD_CATLG_KEY) OR ISNULL(ITEM_SEQUENCE_NUMBER) OR ISNULL(FEATURE_TRANSACTION_ID) OR ISNULL(INFINIUM_GL_CODE) OR INFINIUM_GL_CODE='0000000000000000000000','E','S')
TRANSFORMFIELD.NAME: o_ERROR_FLAG

TRANSFORMATION.DESCRIPTION: This transformation does a lookup on the target S_TXN_CONTRACT_PRODUCT table on the below columns: DPI_CONTRACT_KEY, PRD_CATLG_KEY and ITEM_SEQUENCE_NUMBER, FEATURE_TRANSACTION_ID and returns the following columns along with the above looked up columns: EFFEC_STRT_DT and ROW_HASH
TRANSFORMATION.NAME: LKP_S_TXN_CONTRACT_GIFT

TABLEATTRIBUTE.NAME: Lookup Sql Override
TABLEATTRIBUTE.VALUE: SELECT T1.EFFEC_STRT_DT as EFFEC_STRT_DT, T1.ROW_HASH as ROW_HASH, T1.FIRST_BILL_DATE as FIRST_BILL_DATE, T1.DPI_CONTRACT_KEY as DPI_CONTRACT_KEY, T1.PRD_CATLG_KEY as PRD_CATLG_KEY, T1.ITEM_SEQUENCE_NUMBER as ITEM_SEQUENCE_NUMBER, T1.FEATURE_TRANSACTION_ID as FEATURE_TRANSACTION_ID, T1.USI as USI, T1.EVENT_TYPE as EVENT_TYPE, T1.DPI_ENVIRONMENT as DPI_ENVIRONMENT, T1.SERVICE_TYPE as SERVICE_TYPE, T1.ACCOUNT_SEGMENT as ACCOUNT_SEGMENT FROM $$STG_SCHEMA.S_TXN_CONTRACT_GIFT T1 WHERE CURRENT_FLAG = '$$RECORD_ACTV_FLG'

TABLEATTRIBUTE.NAME: Lookup condition
TABLEATTRIBUTE.VALUE: DPI_CONTRACT_KEY = i_DPI_CONTRACT_KEY AND PRD_CATLG_KEY = i_PRD_CATLG_KEY AND ITEM_SEQUENCE_NUMBER = i_ITEM_SEQUENCE_NUMBER AND USI = i_USI

TRANSFORMATION.DESCRIPTION: This router transformation is used to seggregate the INSERT and UPSERT records based on the group conditions
TRANSFORMATION.NAME: RTR_INSERT_UPSERT_IGNORE

GROUP.DESCRIPTION: not required as of now but lets keep to be clear
GROUP.NAME: INSERT_NEW_ACTIVE_EVENT

GROUP.DESCRIPTION: Path for the data when none of the group conditions are satisfied.
GROUP.NAME: DEFAULT1

TRANSFORMATION.DESCRIPTION: This router transformation is used to check for ERROR_FLAG and send them accordingly to S_TXN_CONTRACT_GIFT_ERROR table.
TRANSFORMATION.NAME: RTR_CHECK_ERROR

GROUP.DESCRIPTION: Path for the data when none of the group conditions are satisfied.
GROUP.NAME: DEFAULT1

TRANSFORMATION.DESCRIPTION: The Source Qualifier transformation is used to extract all the records from the Pre-Stage Contract Gift table and thier corresponding DPI_CONTRACT_KEY and PRD_CATLG_KEY from S_TXN_CONTRACT and S_MST_PRD_CATLG tables respectively. The Pre-SQL has the Re-startability queries.
TRANSFORMATION.NAME: SQ_SC_PS_TXN_CONTRACT_GIFT

TABLEATTRIBUTE.NAME: Sql Query
TABLEATTRIBUTE.VALUE:
SELECT T2.GIFT_ID as GIFT_ID, T2.CONTRACT_ID as CONTRACT_ID, T2.DPI_CONTRACT_ID as DPI_CONTRACT_ID, T2.ACTIVITY_FLAG as ACTIVITY_FLAG, T2.GIFT_SEND_DATE as GIFT_SEND_DATE, T2.VALUE as VALUE, T2.CREATE_DATE as CREATE_DATE, T2.ROW_HASH as ROW_HASH, T2.ITEM_SEQUENCE_NUMBER as ITEM_SEQUENCE_NUMBER, T2.DPI_CONTRACT_KEY as DPI_CONTRACT_KEY, CASE WHEN T2.CASE_CHECK = 5 THEN NULL ELSE T2.PRD_CATLG_KEY END as PRD_CATLG_KEY, T2.FEATURE_TRANSACTION_ID as FEATURE_TRANSACTION_ID, T2.DPI_GL_CODE as DPI_GL_CODE, T2.INFINIUM_GL_CODE as INFINIUM_GL_CODE, T2.TARIFF as TARIFF, T2.TAX_DISTRICT as TAX_DISTRICT, T2.GEO_CODE as GEO_CODE, T2.WIRE_CENTER as WIRE_CENTER, T2.IN_DATE as IN_DATE, T2.USI as USI, 0 AS CA_GENERATED, T2.DPI_ENVIRONMENT AS DPI_ENVIRONMENT, T2.SERVICE_TYPE AS SERVICE_TYPE, T2.ACCOUNT_SEGMENT AS ACCOUNT_SEGMENT FROM ( SELECT T1.GIFT_ID as GIFT_ID, T1.CONTRACT_ID as CONTRACT_ID, T1.DPI_CONTRACT_ID as DPI_CONTRACT_ID, T1.ACTIVITY_FLAG as ACTIVITY_FLAG, T1.GIFT_SEND_DATE as GIFT_SEND_DATE, T1.VALUE as VALUE, T1.CREATE_DATE as CREATE_DATE, T1.ROW_HASH as ROW_HASH, T1.ITEM_SEQUENCE_NUMBER as ITEM_SEQUENCE_NUMBER, T1.DPI_CONTRACT_KEY as DPI_CONTRACT_KEY, T1.PRD_CATLG_KEY as PRD_CATLG_KEY, T1.FEATURE_TRANSACTION_ID as FEATURE_TRANSACTION_ID, T1.DPI_GL_CODE as DPI_GL_CODE, T1.INFINIUM_GL_CODE as INFINIUM_GL_CODE, T1.TARIFF as TARIFF, T1.TAX_DISTRICT as TAX_DISTRICT, T1.GEO_CODE as GEO_CODE, T1.WIRE_CENTER as WIRE_CENTER, T1.IN_DATE as IN_DATE, T1.USI as USI, 0 as CA_GENERATED, T1.DPI_ENVIRONMENT AS DPI_ENVIRONMENT, T1.SERVICE_TYPE AS SERVICE_TYPE, T1.ACCOUNT_SEGMENT AS ACCOUNT_SEGMENT, T1.CASE_CHECK, ROW_NUMBER () OVER (PARTITION BY T1.CONTRACT_ID,T1.USI,T1.ITEM_SEQUENCE_NUMBER,T1.ROW_HASH order by T1.CASE_CHECK) as RNK FROM ( SELECT PCG.GIFT_ID as GIFT_ID, PCG.CONTRACT_ID as CONTRACT_ID, SCT.DPI_CONTRACT_ID as DPI_CONTRACT_ID, PCG.ACTIVITY_FLAG as ACTIVITY_FLAG, PCG.GIFT_SEND_DATE as GIFT_SEND_DATE, PCG.VALUE as VALUE, PCG.CREATE_DATE as CREATE_DATE, PCG.ROW_HASH as ROW_HASH, PCG.ITEM_SEQUENCE_NUMBER as ITEM_SEQUENCE_NUMBER, SCT.DPI_CONTRACT_KEY as DPI_CONTRACT_KEY, SPROD.PRD_CATLG_KEY AS PRD_CATLG_KEY , CASE WHEN (PCG.TARIFF=TRIM(SPROD.TARIF_CD) AND PCG.SERVICE_TYPE=SPROD.SVC_TYPE) THEN 1 WHEN (PCG.TARIFF = TRIM(SPROD.TARIF_CD)AND $$SVC_TYPE = SPROD.SVC_TYPE) THEN 2 WHEN (PCG.SERVICE_TYPE =SPROD.SVC_TYPE AND $$TARIFF = SPROD.TARIF_CD) THEN 3 WHEN ($$TARIFF= SPROD.TARIF_CD AND $$SVC_TYPE = SPROD.SVC_TYPE) THEN 4 ELSE 5 END AS CASE_CHECK,
PCG.FEATURE_TRANSACTION_ID as FEATURE_TRANSACTION_ID, PCG.DPI_GL_CODE as DPI_GL_CODE, PCG.INFINIUM_GL_CODE as INFINIUM_GL_CODE, PCG.TARIFF as TARIFF, PCG.TAX_DISTRICT as TAX_DISTRICT, PCG.GEO_CODE as GEO_CODE, PCG.WIRE_CENTER as WIRE_CENTER, PCG.IN_DATE as IN_DATE, PCG.USI as USI, 0 as CA_GENERATED, PCG.DPI_ENVIRONMENT AS DPI_ENVIRONMENT, PCG.SERVICE_TYPE AS SERVICE_TYPE, PCG.ACCOUNT_SEGMENT AS ACCOUNT_SEGMENT FROM $$PRE_STG_SCHEMA.PS_TXN_CONTRACT_GIFT PCG LEFT OUTER JOIN $$PRE_STG_SCHEMA.PS_TXN_CONTRACT PCT ON PCG.CONTRACT_ID = PCT.CONTRACT_ID AND PCT.ETL_CYCLE_ID = $$ETL_CYCLE_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT DISTINCT DPI_CONTRACT_KEY, DPI_CONTRACT_ID FROM $$PRE_STG_SCHEMA.S_TXN_CONTRACT WHERE CURRENT_FLAG='$$RECORD_ACTV_FLG') SCT ON PCT.DPI_CONTRACT_ID = SCT.DPI_CONTRACT_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT DISTINCT PRD_CD, DPI_ENVRN, TARIF_CD, SVC_TYPE, PRD_CATLG_KEY FROM $$STG_SCHEMA.S_MST_PRD_CATLG WHERE CURRENT_FLAG='$$RECORD_ACTV_FLG') SPROD
ON PCG.GIFT_ID = TRIM(SPROD.PRD_CD) AND PCG.DPI_ENVIRONMENT = TRIM(SPROD.DPI_ENVRN) where PCG.ETL_CYCLE_ID=$$ETL_CYCLE_ID
) T1 ) T2 WHERE T2.RNK=1
UNION ALL SELECT TG.GIFT_ID AS GIFT_ID, STC.STD_CONTRACT_ID AS CONTRACT_ID, STC.DPI_CONTRACT_ID AS DPI_CONTRACT_ID, 'O' AS ACTIVITY_FLAG, TG.GIFT_SEND_DATE as GIFT_SEND_DATE, TG.VALUE as VALUE, TG.CREATE_DATE as CREATE_DATE, TG.ROW_HASH as ROW_HASH, TG.ITEM_SEQUENCE_NUMBER as ITEM_SEQUENCE_NUMBER, TG.DPI_CONTRACT_KEY as DPI_CONTRACT_KEY, TG.PRD_CATLG_KEY as PRD_CATLG_KEY, TG.FEATURE_TRANSACTION_ID as FEATURE_TRANSACTION_ID, TG.DPI_GL_CODE as DPI_GL_CODE, TG.INFINIUM_GL_CODE as INFINIUM_GL_CODE, TG.TARIFF as TARIFF, TG.TAX_DISTRICT as TAX_DISTRICT, TG.GEO_CODE as GEO_CODE, TG.WIRE_CENTER as WIRE_CENTER, TG.IN_DATE as IN_DATE, TG.USI as USI, 1 AS CA_GENERATED, TG.DPI_ENVIRONMENT AS DPI_ENVIRONMENT, TG.SERVICE_TYPE AS SERVICE_TYPE, TG.ACCOUNT_SEGMENT AS ACCOUNT_SEGMENT FROM $$STG_SCHEMA.S_TXN_CONTRACT_GIFT TG inner join $$STG_SCHEMA.S_TXN_CONTRACT STC on stc.DPI_CONTRACT_KEY=TG.DPI_CONTRACT_KEY where TG.current_flag='$$RECORD_ACTV_FLG' and STC.etl_cycle_id=$$ETL_CYCLE_ID and stc.activity_flag='O' and TG.EVENT_TYPE='CAPTURE'

TABLEATTRIBUTE.NAME: Pre SQL

TRANSFORMATION.DESCRIPTION: This expression transformation is used for generating the MD5 value of the non-primary key columns and INS_FLAG and UPD_FLAG values
TRANSFORMATION.NAME: EXP_GENERATE_HASH

TRANSFORMFIELD.EXPRESSION: IIF(ISNULL(lkp_DPI_CONTRACT_KEY) OR ISNULL(lkp_PRD_CATLG_KEY) OR ISNULL(lkp_ITEM_SEQUENCE_NUMBER) OR ISNULL(lkp_USI),'I')
TRANSFORMFIELD.NAME: v_INS_FLAG

TRANSFORMFIELD.DESCRIPTION: Mark the type of event recieved from Source 1. ONLY CAPTURE EVENT ='C' 2. COMBINED EVENT='R' 3. ONLY RELEASE EVENT/DISQUALIFIED EVENT coming as an update to existing gift record. ='U' 4. Direct Outed record
TRANSFORMFIELD.EXPRESSION: DECODE(1, v_INS_FLAG='I' and ISNULL(GIFT_SEND_DATE) and ACTIVITY_FLAG<>'O', 'C', --ONLY CAPTURE EVENT v_INS_FLAG='I' and NOT ISNULL(GIFT_SEND_DATE) and ACTIVITY_FLAG<>'O', 'R', --COMBINED EVENT v_UPD_FLAG='U' ,'U' -- ONLY RELEASE EVENT/ WRITE-OFF/ DISQUALIFIED EVENT )
TRANSFORMFIELD.NAME: o_INPUT_TYPE_FLAG

TRANSFORMATION.DESCRIPTION: This expression is used to generate the ETL Common Column values to the update records and set CURRENT_FLAG to N
TRANSFORMATION.NAME: EXP_UPDATE_S_TXN_CONTRACT_GIFT

TRANSFORMATION.DESCRIPTION: This update strategy uses DD_UPDATE to populate records into the target table
TRANSFORMATION.NAME: UP_S_TXN_CONTRACT_GIFT_UPD

TRANSFORMATION.DESCRIPTION: This expression is used to generate the ETL Common Column values to insert records and set CURRENT_FLAG to Y
TRANSFORMATION.NAME: EXP_INSERT_S_TXN_CONTRACT_GIFT_CAPTURE

TRANSFORMFIELD.DESCRIPTION: If capture event is generated from the direct valid release event, i.e when a release event came in without any existing capture event, this flag will be set to 2, else straight pull (0)
TRANSFORMFIELD.NAME: o_CA_GENERATED

TRANSFORMATION.DESCRIPTION: This expression is used to generate the ETL Common Column values to insert records and set CURRENT_FLAG to Y
TRANSFORMATION.NAME: EXP_INSERT_S_TXN_CONTRACT_GIFT

TRANSFORMFIELD.EXPRESSION: DECODE(1, ACTIVITY_FLAG<>'O' and not isnull(GIFT_SEND_DATE ) and lkp_EVENT_TYPE='CAPTURE','RELEASE', ACTIVITY_FLAG='O' and lkp_EVENT_TYPE='CAPTURE','WRITE-OFF' ,'DISQUALIFY')
TRANSFORMFIELD.NAME: EVENT_TYPE

INSTANCE.DESCRIPTION: Insert instance for CONTRACT_GIFT (only RELEASE events)
INSTANCE.NAME: SC_S_TXN_CONTRACT_GIFT_INSERT_RELEASE

INSTANCE.DESCRIPTION: Insert instance for CONTRACT_GIFT (only CAPTURE events)
INSTANCE.NAME: SC_S_TXN_CONTRACT_GIFT_INSERT_CAPTURE

TABLEATTRIBUTE.NAME: Pre SQL
TABLEATTRIBUTE.VALUE: DELETE FROM $$STG_SCHEMA.S_TXN_CONTRACT_GIFT_ERROR WHERE ETL_CYCLE_ID=$$ETL_CYCLE_ID AND ERROR_CODE NOT LIKE 'Q%'; COMMIT;

INSTANCE.DESCRIPTION: This expression is used to generate the ETL Common Column values to insert records and set CURRENT_FLAG to Y
INSTANCE.NAME: EXP_INSERT_S_TXN_CONTRACT_GIFT_RELEASE

INSTANCE.DESCRIPTION: This expression transformation is used as a pass through expression and to genereate the Error columns for the Error Table along with the Error_flag
INSTANCE.NAME: EXP_GENERATE_COMMON_FIELDS

INSTANCE.DESCRIPTION: This transformation does a lookup on the target S_TXN_CONTRACT_PRODUCT table on the below columns: DPI_CONTRACT_KEY, PRD_CATLG_KEY and ITEM_SEQUENCE_NUMBER, FEATURE_TRANSACTION_ID and returns the following columns along with the above looked up columns: EFFEC_STRT_DT and ROW_HASH
INSTANCE.NAME: LKP_S_TXN_CONTRACT_GIFT

INSTANCE.DESCRIPTION: This router transformation is used to seggregate the INSERT and UPSERT records based on the group conditions
INSTANCE.NAME: RTR_INSERT_UPSERT_IGNORE

INSTANCE.DESCRIPTION: This router transformation is used to check for ERROR_FLAG and send them accordingly to S_TXN_CONTRACT_GIFT_ERROR table.
INSTANCE.NAME: RTR_CHECK_ERROR

INSTANCE.DESCRIPTION: The Source Qualifier transformation is used to extract all the records from the Pre-Stage Contract Gift table and thier corresponding DPI_CONTRACT_KEY and PRD_CATLG_KEY from S_TXN_CONTRACT and S_MST_PRD_CATLG tables respectively. The Pre-SQL has the Re-startability queries.
INSTANCE.NAME: SQ_SC_PS_TXN_CONTRACT_GIFT

INSTANCE.DESCRIPTION: This expression transformation is used for generating the MD5 value of the non-primary key columns and INS_FLAG and UPD_FLAG values
INSTANCE.NAME: EXP_GENERATE_HASH

INSTANCE.DESCRIPTION: This expression is used to generate the ETL Common Column values to the update records and set CURRENT_FLAG to N
INSTANCE.NAME: EXP_UPDATE_S_TXN_CONTRACT_GIFT

INSTANCE.DESCRIPTION: This update strategy uses DD_UPDATE to populate records into the target table
INSTANCE.NAME: UP_S_TXN_CONTRACT_GIFT_UPD

INSTANCE.DESCRIPTION: This expression is used to generate the ETL Common Column values to insert records and set CURRENT_FLAG to Y
INSTANCE.NAME: EXP_INSERT_S_TXN_CONTRACT_GIFT_CAPTURE

INSTANCE.DESCRIPTION: This expression is used to generate the ETL Common Column values to insert records and set CURRENT_FLAG to Y
INSTANCE.NAME: EXP_INSERT_S_TXN_CONTRACT_GIFT

INSTANCE.DESCRIPTION: Pre stage table source for CONTRACT_GIFT
INSTANCE.NAME: SC_PS_TXN_CONTRACT_GIFT

MAPPINGVARIABLE.DESCRIPTION: Schema name for Pre Staging tables
MAPPINGVARIABLE.NAME: $$PRE_STG_SCHEMA

MAPPINGVARIABLE.DESCRIPTION: Active Flag value to indicate current record in SCD2
MAPPINGVARIABLE.NAME: $$RECORD_ACTV_FLG

MAPPINGVARIABLE.DESCRIPTION: INActive Flag value to indicate past record in SCD2
MAPPINGVARIABLE.NAME: $$RECORD_INACTV_FLG

MAPPINGVARIABLE.DESCRIPTION: Code Value to indicate that Error reprocessing is not required
MAPPINGVARIABLE.NAME: $$ERR_REPROCES_REQURD_FLG

MAPPINGVARIABLE.DESCRIPTION: Code value to indicate that reprocessing of record is not yet complete
MAPPINGVARIABLE.NAME: $$ERR_REPROCES_COMPLT_FLG

MAPPINGVARIABLE.DESCRIPTION: Effective end date for a past record in SCD2
MAPPINGVARIABLE.NAME: $$EFFEC_END_DT

MAPPINGVARIABLE.DESCRIPTION: Effective start date for an initial record in SCD2
MAPPINGVARIABLE.NAME: $$EFFEC_STRT_DT

MAPPINGVARIABLE.DESCRIPTION: Active Flag value for Error Reporcessing Required
MAPPINGVARIABLE.NAME: $$ERR_REPROCES_REQURD_ACTV_FLG

MAPPINGVARIABLE.DESCRIPTION: Error Code for ITEM_SEQUENCE_NUMBER is null
MAPPINGVARIABLE.NAME: $$E009

MAPPINGVARIABLE.DESCRIPTION: Error Code for DPI_CONTRACT_KEY is missing
MAPPINGVARIABLE.NAME: $$R001

MAPPINGVARIABLE.DESCRIPTION: Error code for PRD_CATLG_KEY is missing
MAPPINGVARIABLE.NAME: $$R002

MAPPINGVARIABLE.DESCRIPTION: Error code for FEATURE_TRANSACTION_ID is null
MAPPINGVARIABLE.NAME: $$E010

MAPPINGVARIABLE.DESCRIPTION: Error Code for INFINIUM_GL_CODE is null
MAPPINGVARIABLE.NAME: $$E015

SHORTCUT.COMMENTS: Creating a reusable lookup to fetch FIRST_BILLING_DATE for a contract
SHORTCUT.NAME: SC_LKP_FETCH_FIRST_BILL_DATE

TRANSFORMATION.DESCRIPTION: Creating a reusable lookup to fetch FIRST_BILLING_DATE for a contract
TRANSFORMATION.NAME: LKP_FETCH_FIRST_BILL_DATE

TABLEATTRIBUTE.NAME: Lookup Sql Override
TABLEATTRIBUTE.VALUE: SELECT PBC.BILL_DATE as BILL_DATE, PBC.CYCLE_BEGIN as CYCLE_BEGIN, CON.CONTRACT_ID as CONTRACT_ID FROM $$PRE_STG_SCHEMA.PS_TXN_CONTRACT CON INNER JOIN $$PRE_STG_SCHEMA.PS_TXN_CUSTOMER CUS ON CON.CUSTOMER_ID = CUS.CUSTOMER_ID INNER JOIN $$STG_SCHEMA.S_PROCESSED_BILLING_CYCLE PBC ON CUS.BILL_CYCLE_ID = PBC.ID WHERE PBC.ETL_CYCLE_ID=$$ETL_CYCLE_ID
